name: 6 Classic Arcade Watch Games
description:
A pack of 6 classic arcade games for you to enjoy on your Apple Watch, or your iPhone/iPad.

◉ Galaxy
Shoot the aliens - defend your galaxy.

◉ Whack Mole
Use the hammer to strike a mole.

◉ City Drift
Drift car in a city, how far you can go.

◉ Move The Box
Move all box to the green pot.

◉ Match Pair
Match all pair before timeout.

◉ Rock Paper Scissors
Find your best strategy to win 2 other computers.
